content.raw:
I am not sure if it is related, but when I run the tests, `Comms` test seems to fail due to the timeout. I set the timeout to 20 seconds in `comms.test`, and apparently line 39 in `comms.cc` seems to take some time and finally fail: `EXPECT_TRUE(this->WaitForGazebo(5s));`.

There may be a problem on my settings, though. Could you reproduce it?
